WindowRequestFileSystem.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The non-standard method
requestFileSystem() method is a Google Chrome-specific
method which lets a website or app gain access to a sandboxed file system for its own
use. The returned is then available for use with the other file system APIs.

blockquote.para: Note: This method is prefixed with webkit in all browsers that implement it.

remarks.para: -File and Directory Entries API support in Firefox
